name: Monkey.D.Luffy
text: On Play: You may return one or more Don!! cards from play to your Don!! deck: Draw 1 card, then this character gains Rush for this turn.

effect.text: You may return one or more Don!! cards from play to your Don!! deck: Draw 1 card, then this character gains Rush for this turn.

meta.notes: Card is marked as a sample. Power value is clearly printed as 10000. Rarity is 'R' as printed in the bottom right corner. No life value is printed. No counter icon present.
